mapper.sql: id, one_common_id, two_common_id, execution_cross, executive_class, check_if, process, workitem_status, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_workitem_relation WHERE (delete_flag = 0 or delete_flag is null);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_workitem_relation WHERE workitem_status = 4 and (delete_flag = 0 or delete_flag is null);

SELECT t.id,t1.ship_number,t1.batch,t1.segmentation,CONCAT(t1.part_number,',',t2.part_number) as part_number FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t2.delete_flag = 0 AND t1.`status` = 3 AND t2.`status` = 3 AND t.workitem_status = 0 AND t.execution_cross = 'nothing' AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t1.ship_number,t1.segmentation,t1.id as id1 ,t2.id as id2 FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t2.delete_flag = 0 AND t1.`status` = 3 AND t2.`status` = 3 AND t.workitem_status = 0 AND t.execution_cross = 'nothing' AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT t.id,t1.ship_number,t1.batch,t1.segmentation,CONCAT(t1.part_number,',',t2.part_number) as part_number,t.workitem_status,(select a.name from t_role a where a.id =t.executive_class) as executive_class FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status IN (0,1) AND t.execution_cross <> 'nothing' AND (t.execution_cross in ( SELECT CASE WHEN c.id=7 or c.id=8 or c.id=4 THEN 1 WHEN c.id=9 or c.id=10 or c.id=5 THEN 2 WHEN c.id=13 or c.id=14 or c.id=6 THEN 3 ELSE 0 END FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or '11' in (select c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status IN (0,1) AND t.execution_cross <> 'nothing' AND (t.execution_cross in ( SELECT CASE WHEN c.id=7 or c.id=8 or c.id=4 THEN 1 WHEN c.id=9 or c.id=10 or c.id=5 THEN 2 WHEN c.id=13 or c.id=14 or c.id=6 THEN 3 ELSE 0 END FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or '11' in (select c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT t.id,t1.ship_number,t1.batch,t1.segmentation,CONCAT(t1.part_number,',',t2.part_number) as part_number,t.update_date FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status IN (0,1) AND t.execution_cross <> 'nothing' AND (t.execution_cross in ( SELECT CASE WHEN c.id=7 or c.id=8 or c.id=4 THEN 1 WHEN c.id=9 or c.id=10 or c.id=5 THEN 2 WHEN c.id=13 or c.id=14 or c.id=6 THEN 3 ELSE 0 END FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or '11' in (select c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )) AND (t.executive_class in ( SELECT c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or '11' in (select c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status IN (0,1) AND t.execution_cross <> 'nothing' AND (t.execution_cross in ( SELECT CASE WHEN c.id=7 or c.id=8 or c.id=4 THEN 1 WHEN c.id=9 or c.id=10 or c.id=5 THEN 2 WHEN c.id=13 or c.id=14 or c.id=6 THEN 3 ELSE 0 END FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or '11' in (select c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )) AND (t.executive_class in ( SELECT c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or '11' in (select c.id FROM t_role c where c.id in ( SELECT b.role_id from t_admin a LEFT JOIN t_admin_role b ON a.id = b.admin_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.`no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT t.id,t1.ship_number,t1.batch,t1.segmentation,CONCAT(t1.part_number,',',t2.part_number) as part_number,t.workitem_status,t.executive_class FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_workitem t3 ON t.id = t3.workItem_id AND t3.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status = 2 AND t.check_if = 1 AND t3.now is null AND t.process <> 'nothing' AND t.process like '%${type}%' AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_workitem t3 ON t.id = t3.workItem_id AND t3.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status = 2 AND t.check_if = 1 AND t3.now is null AND t.process <> 'nothing' AND t.process like '%${type}%' AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT t.id,t1.ship_number,t1.batch,t1.segmentation,CONCAT(t1.part_number,',',t2.part_number) as part_number,t3.description FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_workitem t3 ON t.id = t3.workItem_id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t3.description is not null AND t.workitem_status in(2,3) AND t3.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_workitem t3 ON t.id = t3.workItem_id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t3.description is not null AND t.workitem_status in(2,3) AND t3.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_workitem t3 ON t.id = t3.workItem_id AND t3.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status in (2,3) AND t.check_if = 1 AND t3.now is not null AND t.process <> 'nothing' AND t.process like '%${type}%' AND to_days(t3.update_date) = to_days(now());

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_workitem t3 ON t.id = t3.workItem_id AND t3.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status in (2,3) AND t.check_if = 1 AND t3.now is not null AND t.process <> 'nothing' AND t.process like '%${type}%' AND DATE_FORMAT(t3.update_date,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m');

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status = 3

SELECT t.id,t1.ship_number,t1.batch,t1.segmentation,CONCAT(t1.part_number,',',t2.part_number) as part_number,t.workitem_status,t.car_number FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status in (3,4) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_workitem_relation t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.one_common_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.two_common_id = t2.id WHERE (t.delete_flag = 0 or t.delete_flag is null) AND t.workitem_status in (3,4) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_workitem_relation SET execution_cross = #{kua,jdbcType=VARCHAR},updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE (delete_flag = 0 OR delete_flag IS NULL) AND id IN
#{item}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_workitem_relation SET workitem_status = 2, check_if = 1, process = #{item.process}, updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE (delete_flag = 0 OR delete_flag IS NULL) AND ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE t_workitem_relation SET workitem_status = 3, updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE (delete_flag = 0 OR delete_flag IS NULL) AND ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE t_workitem_relation SET workitem_status = 4, car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE (delete_flag = 0 OR delete_flag IS NULL) AND ID in
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into t_workitem_relation (id, one_common_id, two_common_id, execution_cross, executive_class, check_if, process, workitem_status, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oneCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twoCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executionCross,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executiveClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkIf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workitemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

one_common_id,

mapper.update:
update t_workitem_relation
one_common_id = #{oneCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
two_common_id = #{twoCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execution_cross = #{executionCross,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
executive_class = #{executiveClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_if = #{checkIf,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process = #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workitem_status = #{workitemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_workitem_relation set one_common_id = #{oneCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, two_common_id = #{twoCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execution_cross = #{executionCross,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, executive_class = #{executiveClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_if = #{checkIf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process = #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workitem_status = #{workitemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
